# determined

**Type Property**

The user has set the app’s level of access to home data.

## Declaration

```swift
static var determined: HMHomeManagerAuthorizationStatus { get }
```

## Recognizing Status Values

- **authorized**: The app has access to home data.
- **restricted**: The app doesn’t have access to home data.

items.description: The app has access to home data.

items.description: The app doesn’t have access to home data.
